headline: Jim Cramer on American Electric Power: “One of My Favorite Utilities for Multiple Years”
summary: American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently looked at. Inquiring if their portfolio is diversified enough, a club member mentioned that their top five holdings are PM, AMZN, NVDA, AEP, and UBER. In response, Cramer said: Okay, Uber, we know is transport. Amazon, we’re going to call it, […]
